<th style="font-weight:normal;">
The targetopia is an ecosystem of R packages for democratized reproducible pipelines at scale. [Make](https://www.gnu.org/software/make/)-like pipelines accelerate development and reduce frustration for research papers, simulation studies, and other data science projects with copious workflows and demanding runtimes. The targetopia makes powerful pipelines accessible and friendly.<br><br>
